alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Rensselaer; Northern Washington; Southern Washington; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 3:32AM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Washington, Rensselaer, Columbia, and Dutchess Counties in eastern New York. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heaviest between 9 pm this evening and 5 am Tuesday, where snowfall rates of around 0.5 inch per hour are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
